attributes.title: Why is this even on the apple store? Glitchy app
attributes.review: Apple is a company I hold to a high standard, this app is not a good reflection of this company. This app glitches, freezes, & simply does not work. This has to be the worst app on here.

attributes.title: Worst EVER
attributes.review: i downloaded the app as a true Trump supporter and then it made my phone terribly glitch and catch on FIRE!! AWFUL. don’t download in case this happens to you, need to go get a new phone and Apple ID as well. Bummer. I guess i’m Biden 2020 now

attributes.title: Gen z
attributes.review:
This app is so terrible!! There’s no reason to even get it, there’s nothing to do on here 😡!
This ridiculous app made my BRAND NEW PHONE glitch 😤and there’s so many viruses on my phone now! Thanks Cheeto Trump you made my phone break 👩‍🦲🐀.

attributes.title: I HAD TO GET A NEW PHONE
attributes.review: The app was asking me a lot of personal questions that I didn’t feel comfortable sharing hopefully no one has to experience this like me. I hope no get this app. It’s the worst app in this store.

attributes.title: Do not download!!
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever! It asked me for my phone number, once I submitted it they would not stop texting me about an orange 🍊 and they harassed me and called me a roach!!! 0/10 do not recommend downloading this app!!

attributes.title: Do Not Download. Terribly Stinky
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app my whole phone started to smell terribly stinky. The stench was similar to the smell of my grandmothers poopoo when she was on her deathbed 💔 so not only did it smell but also made me very sad. Do NOT recommend

attributes.title: it burned my house down
attributes.review: the app took  years to download and once it did my phone caught on fire and burned my house down. In the house was my family and dogs. Thanks to the roach of a president i am now an orphan ✨

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: I was just trying to support our lord and savior the orange god yet the app didn’t let me open it up, it took F O R E V E R to download and when I got there I kept glitching and said “don’t vote for trump” very confusing stuff, I rate this thing one star!

attributes.title: Absolutely trash
attributes.review: Complete garbage app doesn’t even work I get in and it asks for my mobile phone so I gave it my phone and now I don’t have a phone to even use the app on

attributes.title: Glitches and killed my family
attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever used, it made my phone glitch and then killed my entire family. Do not download this app
